column5: me and my dad both love fishing and we recently got fishing kayaks and we are just wondering where the best fishing kayak spot is
Toronto Island is tough to beat.
Rouge River Basin and Frenchmans bay are different areas to try as well.
Toronto Islands or LeslieÂ St. Spit area.

If you are willing to drive out of the GTA there are quite a few good conservation area's that are great in a kayak - Guelph Lake, Kelso Conservation Area, Island Lake and Rockwood Lake are fun and have good opportunities for Bass and Pike and since no motors are allowed it yak friendly Andrew
Try the Kawartha Lakes. Lots of good kayak fishing
